title: Add a Home navigation option that restarts the guided chat

requirements.summary: Add a keyboard-accessible "Home" menu option that resets the guided chat to the welcome step and scrolls back to the top without adding routes or reloading.
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly visible navigation/menu area includes a "Home" option labeled exactly "Home".
Clicking "Home" resets the guided flow back to the initial welcome state (equivalent to Start Over/restart).
Clicking "Home" scrolls the page to the top of the app (or hero/header area) so the user is oriented back at the start.
The Home option is keyboard accessible and has an appropriate accessible label/semantics (e.g., button or link).
No new pages or routing are introduced; the app remains a single-page guided experience.

file_operations.description: Introduce a simple navigation/menu area in the existing hero header that includes a "Home" button (semantic <button>), and implement its behavior to (1) reset the guided experience back to the welcome step without any route changes by forcing a GuidedFlow remount via a React key, and (2) scroll the window back to the top (smoothly) so the hero/header is visible again. Ensure the "Home" control is clearly visible, keyboard accessible, and has appropriate accessible labeling.
